NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Complete your application for NCS with The Challenge today!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for expressing your interest in NCS with The Challenge through NCSYES.co.uk. The quickest way to complete an application is online, and this will give you a £5 online discount. We already have an account for you, so please log in here to continue and complete your application.
Your log in details are as follows:
ChallengeID: {!Account.TCNAccountID__c} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
NCS with The Challenge is a fun and action packed part-residential programme designed exclusively for 15-17 year olds. On the programme, you will build self-confidence as well as skills in leadership, teamwork and communication. Employers and universities also recognise the unique value of the programme, helping you to stand out in the future.
While we offer a wide range of start dates, there are a limited number of places available on each date, so we recommend you complete your application as soon as possible. The quickest and easiest way to confirm a place is through our website. Please visit NCSTheChallenge.org for more information about the programme and to sign up today!
If you have any further questions, please visit our online FAQs. Alternatively you can email us at contact@the-challenge.org.
Yours sincerely,
Rebecca Carter Director at The Challenge
